overview:
Imelda Suriato is a design and brand development professional with over twelve years of experience in both traditional and interactive agency settings. She came to Squeaky in 2006 after honing her skills as creative lead and information architect at several agencies in the NY Metro area. Imelda is originally from Jakarta, Indonesia, where she ran her own design and photo studio.

As Creative Director at Squeaky, Imelda takes all the pieces and puts them together, ensuring that Squeakyâ€™s clients offer their users a highly productive online experience. A highly motivated (and motivational) personality, she skillfully combines art and science to ensure that Squeakyâ€™s end product is the most original, and best, in the industry.
